title: Hackers are pretending to be cybersecurity firm to lock your entire PC
description: Hackers continue coming up with new ways to scam their victims. This time, a ransomware is being used to impersonate a cybersecurity firm.

title: ‘World’s largest sundial’ to double as green energy provider
description: Houston’s next piece of public art is being described as the world's largest sundial and will also produce solar power for the local community.
